message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_CASE_ID_NOT_SET
message.locale: A Case ID must be provided.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_AUDIT_PLAN_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Audit Plan must be provided.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONTRIBUTOR_REQUIRED_FOR_ASSIGNED_STATE
message.locale: An auditor or an audit team must be specified when assigning a Case Audit.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_COMPLETE_WITHOUT_FINDINGS
message.locale: A Case Audit can not be completed until findings are entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_COMPLETE_WITHOUT_FOCUS_AREA_FINDINGS
message.locale: A Case Audit can not be completed until all focus area findings are entered.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_SEARCH_CRITERIA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CASE_ALREADY_SELECTED_FOR_AUDIT
message.locale: This case has already been selected for audit as part of this audit plan.

message.name: ERR_XFV_BOTH_AUDITOR_AND_TEAM_POPULATED
message.locale: A case audit should be assigned to either an auditor or an audit team but not both.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_RECORDS_MATCH_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: No records match the given search criteria.

message.name: ERR_FV_STATUS_OPEN_OR_ASSIGNED_REQUIRED_FOR_ASSIGNED_STATE
message.locale: The case audit can only be assigned when the status is 'Open' or 'Assigned'.

message.name: ERR_FV_STATUS_ASSIGNED_REQUIRED_FOR_OPEN_STATE
message.locale: The assigned auditor or audit team can only be removed from an 'Assigned' case audit.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_FINDINGS_COMPLETE_CASE_AUDIT
message.locale: Findings cannot be modified when the Case Audit is in status 'Complete'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CASE_AUDIT_INVALID_USER
message.locale: This case audit can only be modified by the audit coordinator or an auditor assigned to the case audit.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_REMOVE_CASE_AUDIT_INVALID_STATUS
message.locale: This case audit can only be removed from the audit plan when the audit plan status is 'Pending' , or, when the audit plan status is 'In Progress' and the case audit status is 'Open'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_COMPLETE_MIN_ONE_FEEDBACK_REQUIRED
message.locale: A Case Audit can not be completed until feedback has been provided by at least one of the users who need to provide feedback.
